title: worked when other apps didn't
comment: one of the only apps that still worked with limited wireless connection.  pleasant design and remembers the last page I was reading.  it would be nice to have a page scroll bar.

title: Sources
comment: The addition of more English Sources such as KissManga, Batoto and Mangafox, will make this the BEST manga app in the Play Store. Would be great if more sources are implemented. Thanks.
How about a genre search and multiple sources that would make it 3x better
In the Play Store listing it states that not genre search is not available for all sources. Finally, there are multiple sources.

title: Add notifications
comment: I found this to be a really promising app. Only thing is that I can't seem to find a way to turn on notifications for my favorite Manga, and the favorites page has no indication for updated manga as well. And hopefully I hope that Manga fox would be added. Great job dev!

I cannot implement notifications. As a student the responsibility required to finance, to program, and to maintain a server which scrapes updates is impractical. As it is open sourced, it generates no revenue since it has no ads, analytics, or purchases. This is a hobby, so I cannot reasonably implement features a company would.

title: It doesn't load any pages
comment: After updated it doesn't load any pages... i can't read anything...

Sorry, The sources are limited. Because this is a free app and my current status, the app does not have a server like Manga Rock or Manga Phoenix to get a database. So prior to a release, I build a small database and package it with the app. For future updates, I'll try to find another way to keep the app up-to-date.
Amazing

title: Good manga app for a solo developer
comment: Really good app overall but I just want some features like scroll to the last read chapter, the queue when downloading chapters needed to be grouped by manga name and an ability to disable the one-touch to the next page. It's irritating that when I need to go back to the main menu it just go to the next page especially for devices with on screen buttons.
This is a legendary app

title: Perfect
comment: I love it!

title: Perfect!!
comment: I was having issues with  manga rock .and  this app solved them all

title: Beautiful
comment: Best free manga app with the most beautiful interface. Did I mention that it's free?

title: Takes too much space downloading
comment: Is it possible to reduce the data usage when you download  manga that has a lot of chapters like naruto,bleach, one piece?

title: Hands Down, the Best Manga App Out There
comment: It has no ads, no unnecessary background data, easy interface. Just gorgeous. Get it. Now.

title: Fantastic app
comment: The app has no adds, has a simple and quick interface, uses good servers for sources, requires no permissions, and has the basic features you need. Reading is quick and smooth and you can zoom for those small print parts. If all you want to do is read manga, then this app is what you need.

title: Perfect app
comment: Much better than many munga apps there is no annoying ads thank you so much ( ^   ^ ) d
Dude, your app just so underrated. I try a lot of manga app, but this is real good. If only you dont have to college , lol ...

It beats the other top manga apps, The other apps are filled with a crap ton of adds and they run in the background when the app isn't in use. This app is perfect, it's easy to use, nice interface, no adds

title: I am so glad I checked this out.
comment: My second review for this amazing application. This became my main manga reader from the time I installed it, everything is perfect for me especially the last update, I've experienced performance boost and everything. But there is one last thing to make this like the perfect application for reading manga, feature to transfer downloaded manga into PC or maybe cloud. Anyways, really good work here, thanks!

title: Awesome but.
comment: Its awesome. But its SO SLOW TO LOADDDD

title: Help
comment: It's nice to use but cam someone advice me if it will auto update new chapter  or we need to set anything.  ?  Some of the story is not complete  and I would like to continue reading it .

Best manga reader I've used.  Beautiful design. I'd like to be able to search by mangaka name and browse by genre, though.  I'd also like it if Manga Fox was added to the sources because I can't find some of the manga I read on any of the current sources.

title: Too long to download
comment: Takes hours to download one chapter. And half the chapters come up as unavailable.  Very disappointing.

title: Really nice app...
comment: There may be a bit of a lag, but I love its design and clear instructions. Thanks for this lovely application ^-^.

title: I stumbled upon a gem
comment: I happen to be looking for a better Manga reading app after being distraught with the current offerings. This is amazing. I do really suggest though that you add a dual page mode for larger tablets. If you could add that you would make my year!

title: Download it while it last
comment: Manga readers like these get dropped off the store so get it as fast as you can this app is fantastic. Pros: Is well organized the manga selection is huge reading is comfortable. Cons: when u enter a manga it gets anoying that when u exit it everything resets and u have to go to where u previosly were manualy, not many choices when it comes to explore...wait its not ur choice, pages load real slow at time and no notifications of when your favorite manga. thats it overall this manga reader is the best by far

I'm developing the application from a new base for version 2.0.+. It is going to address all the performance and the usability problems. The pages aren't actually loading slowly. I batched page requests in parallel so sets of five pages arrive at a time making it seem slow, but overall fast.

title: Request
comment: Request for a top down reading option please. Reading webtoons 1 page at a time doesn't give you the full user experience we were meant to have. Outside of that, great work!

title: Great start
comment: Would be nice to have a button that resumes from where you were reading at then remembering what the chapter were.
i'd like to see chapter sync for multiple devices
You can switch reading direction in the viewer by toggling between Left-to-Right or Right-to-Left.

title: Better than MangaRock
comment: The layout is better and it doesn't crash as much.

title: Aizoban
comment: Awesome User Interface, best looking manga app ive used yet and even more awesome you developed it yourself. Props to you. Could use quick access to favorites and latest manga by chapter.

title: Hat's off 🎩 for the developer
comment: Great app but should add some more manga sources like mangafox...

title: Notification
comment: Please add notification features where the apps can notify users when manga in user's favorite list have new updates.
Its fine  . Just fine

comment: But sometimes the pages are missing. Please fix it

Can't even read/dowload any chapters. I did the "start download" on download queue still won't download. And it won't even load pages even if I read online.

title: I have a question or 2
comment: Do you guys have Tokyo Ghoul Root A? You know what? I give you props for developing this app by yourself. So instead of 3 stars. 4 stars and I'll tell my friends about it.

title: I love it!
comment: I love it so much! Thanks for the great app

title: Good manga reader
comment: There should be an option to hide status bar while reading. Oh, and you should add KissManga as a source, and add an option to delete chapters.

Long clicking a chapter opens a menu to delete them. For the newest version, the status bar should hide automatically after few seconds. My developer console is not showing your version like others; please ensure you are on the latest update.

Sorry! Can you email or message me with specific details? What sources, mangas, chapters, and the like, so I can recreate the problem. I'm working on version 2.0.+ of the application, so I want to make sure I don't miss anything critical.

title: great
comment: I've used many manga readers before and so far this is the best one I've found. I've been using this regularly since I downloaded it. One minor problem is once i had some trouble with loading a chapter and downloading but I've only encountered the problem once so far

title: Wow
comment: This is my dream come true

comment: Please fix it...

Sorry! Can you email or message me with specific details? What sources, mangas, chapters, and the like, so I can recreate the problem. I'm working on version 2.0.+ of the application, so I want to make sure I don't miss anything critical.

comment: when i zoom in cause cant read it whole it becomes blur and cant read it too. pls fix i want this app badly :((((
Sorry! I'm working on version 2.0.+ of the application, so I'm trying to improve on everything I learned about 1.*.+ versions. I'll investigate the image loading logic.

title: Love it.
comment: The app works well for me.

title: Genre
comment: The app is great, its hard to find a good manga app on Google Play. My only problem: I wish you could search by genre or alphabetically, better filters. Just too make searching easier:)

comment: Lot's of love
Most of the mangas are great quality. And a large selection.

title: Loved it
comment: Great job , great user interface . Hope in future updates we get the option of customizing the view

title: Loved it!
comment: Thank you for fixing the errors! I really appreciate it! Now i can read fast! Thank you very much! I loved it than before!😊

title: Very good app
comment: This app is very good. Best of all. It's free and it just works. Recommended to anyone who wants to read and download manga.
After manga galaxy was removed from the playstore I never taught I would ever find a manga reader thar would be good enough for me, then came along Aizoban.

title: Nice manga apps.
comment: Further improvement could be made. As for the next update could you add dark/black background?

title: Can you please add Mangafox?
comment: Please please please add mangafox as a source. Please! Beside that everything is perfect. Havent had any problems with it! Beautiful design, user-friendly and just plain awesome! Unlike other offline manga readers, this one lets me download any manga I want FOR FREE!!! Doesnt require me to buy full version whatsoever WHICH IS THE BEST PART. I can download countless mangas as long as my phone's memory can handle it. Love it so much!!! Keep up the good work!!!!

title: I do love love it
comment: My problem though is the lack of looking for a manga via genre. I rarely read popular mangas since most of them are long. I rated it 5 still due to the great aesthetic of the main page. I hope you feel better and I wish for you to be healthy!!!

title: Smooth, but incomplete
comment: It runs very well compared to other free manga reader apps. However, their databases are kinda larger. Aizoban has Tokyo Ghoul: JACK but not Tokyo Ghoul and Tokyo Ghoul: re.

title: Love it
comment: No words!!  Just love it!!

title: AMAZING
comment: It has all of the manga I love

title: You did it
comment: Love this app had one complaint with it and next update it was fixed.  Very good for manga geeks
I love it!!! The manta looks nice and I can read it clearly without backing it big or small.

comment: Here pages load not the complete chaptr! Full chpter should b loaded at once! And loadin should be shown in bar!!!!!! Improve it plzzzz!

Its good when I can read it but, a coiple hundred of the chapters of mangas aren`t there or loading. For example: Naruto chapters 600+  say are not there.

title: Deleted database
comment: Enough said,  updates are awesome

title: Hard working dev
comment: Wow. The main issue I had of the persistent status bar was quickly resolved. This is now my main manga reading app! Big thumbs up to the Dev

title: Love it
comment: I've tried a lot of other programs and this is the best one out there. I can look up hundreds of mangas new and old and i get the latest. Chapters in ongoing series.

author_name: クランチクランチドロップ
title: Very clean UI
comment: I tried many other manga apps out there but for some reason I always come back to this one. I love the UI and the option to add the whole manga so you can read it offline is such a life saver when you lose 3g/4g on the go. Thanks to you I finally got back into reading manga and actually enjoying it again. ^3^

title: Yes
comment: A must download

title: Doesn't load chapter
comment: I gave this two stars simply due to the UI. Whenever I try to download a chapter it will say it is unable to load the chapter data, it does this for every series. If there is a way to fix this then please help.

title: Superb and flawless
comment: The idea of being able to download all the Manga in the background at once is incredible, and the reader is very user friendly but could be improved in terms of per-loading. I can't find anything bad to comment on given I am a new user of this app. The navigation makes sense, and content is well organized.   Will continue experiencing with it and will update my review. Good job Jacob.

title: One Thing
comment: Best manga reader ever, however my tablet's storage was near its max because it had a lot of manga chapters on it. Anyway to put a delete option on the app?

title: Good
comment: Too damn good to be true. But its true.

title: Amazing
comment: Love this app! I had this other app at first and it was similar to this, but I deleted it to save space and since then I wasn't able to find another app like it. Of course, till' now! Love this app!×
This is the best manga reader I ever saw, but suddenly it stopped working. The manga does not load, I am very sad because it is not working. Please fix it, I really love the app.

comment: I am so glad to have this app now

title: Love it.
comment: Best manga app.

comment: Excuse me but how can i download a manga on this thing ? I cant seem to check the boxes when im downloading a chapter , it just turns pink and the check doesnt appear , is this app broke or something ? Uninstall for now.
Though not a fan of the colour scheme, the app is well made and works well.

title: Here's my hi 5
comment: Truly potential! My req: • 1 click to refresh (new chapter) for ALL 'favorite manga' • backup feature for 'favorite manga' list • mark previous chapter as READ (imagine manga with >100 chapters, so tiring). Then it is perfect!

Thanks. "1 Click to Refresh" is an awesome feature! I couldn't do update notifications because it would cost money to set it up properly while an in-device solution wouldn't be effective. But, if the user triggers an update, then it should be feasible. :)

title: WON'T UPLOAD
comment: The chapters won't upload. Please do something about this.                          Every single manga I've tried to read said there were no chapters that could be viewed.
Sorry! I can't do anything without more info. What source, manga, and chapter? What do you mean upload?

title: good
comment: user friendly
All over is good, but some manga have bad quality pictures, please fix it
Can you be more specific? I have no control over the quality provided by the sources. Like a web browser, this application has no control over what images and their quality is being downloaded.

comment: I like it. :3 ♡ I can download all the manga that I want to read. Thank you so much! :)

comment: Why sometimes some pages are missing (with "!"), sometimes more than 3 pages! i tried to refresh but still, especially on old manga like Initial-D, please fix it.

comment: Can't believe I didn't notice such a simple thing. Beautiful interface and a helpful developer. Definitely loving this app

Needs a bit of improvement. Sometimes it doesn't load images at all.

comment: This app is good n interface like lollipop os. But can u add view small list, manga source, and locate sd card for save manga. That will be perfect

title: One of the best manga reader
comment: One of my favorite manga reader, second to mangacloud. But please add (Tokyo Ghoul re) it really is my favorire manga and I'll rate it 5 star

comment: I think the animes should be updated often

title: Liked this app!
comment: Recently i checked this app and it was good because I can download any mangas but my only concern is that it is slow to download and I suggest that you should put genres on the menu for more easy search.

title: Only two problems
comment: Please add a confirmation to the delete favorites and an across source search, those are my only suggestions

title: Awesome
comment: Awesome app once it has notifications or away to filter the updates section to favorites it will be 5 stars

Hello! You can view: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=arVepCVd7eo. It shows how to toggle the on-screen controls.

title: Best Manga app there is
comment: A Manga reader app.. WITH MARRIAGE DESIGN??!??  This is flawless

title: My favorite manta app
comment: Faster downloading than previous apps I have used. Awesome app!
Works well even if I'm connecting thru data connection. And its free! love it! 💜💜💜

title: Crashed on opening.
comment: A friend recommended me this app for reading manga and I was really excited. Until, everytime I have opened it it has crashed.  I am hoping this issue eventually gets fixed so I can use the app.

For the next update, it will include this fix: https://github.com/jparkie/Aizoban/issues/17. Apparently, Samsung and some device manufacturers included certain files for 4.2.2 devices and above which cause problems with certain applications. The fix uses the application's files instead of the built-in ones to fix the crashing.

title: Awesome ! xD
comment: Thanks for the super cool app. Really love your designed. Keep it up ! :D

title: Definitely best manga app right now
comment: Minor things can be improved like toggle read and unread but definitely better than others

title: Amazing app
comment: If you could implement notifications for when your favorite manga are updated, this'll become my favorite app.

title: ♥Loved it♥
comment: App is really good just that it loads kinda slow well it might be normal but to me it's slow

title: Awesomeeee
comment: Recommend it! Totallllyyyyyy cooolll. Thank you so much!

title: Best app ever
comment: At least this app lets you choose a complete or incomplete unlike Pocket Manga, the only thing that bugs me is incomplete pages or pages not loading, can you please fix it?

title: I really like it
comment: i love your app and can you please add categories. Thanks.

title: really good - just a few improvements
comment: try to add more source , for more manga

title: Awsome Manga Reader!
comment: Has been the best app i've used so far. Only thing for me would be getting notification that a manga has updated, but other than that no complaints. Keep up the good work.

title: Could have been way better
comment: Aizoban is a great manga app after I lost manga zoo my main problem with this app is the fact that there isn't a category section so I can pic what genere book I would like to read so that finding a book i want to read is easier. THIS APP IS ALSO MISSING A LOT OF PAGES OF   MANGA I WANT TO READ😭

Sorry! As listed in the description, not all sources have genre filtering, specifically MangaEden. All other sources have a form of genre filtering. There is a choice of sources as some sources in itself may lack manga. MangaEden doesn't have genre filtering as I as a student don't have the resources like a company to scrape it.

title: Really good - just a few improvements
comment: First of all this app is so beautifully designed and functional - I love it. The only thing is the lag when scrolling through the catalogue on larger screens. For example, on my moto g I can scroll through the catalogue just fine, yet on my Nexus 7 there is a noticeable lag. I'm thinking that this is because there are more elements to load? Maybe if there was an option in the settings to change how many titles are displayed in rows and columns when on the catalogue this could be fixed? Brilliant app though!
Thanks! For the suggestion. The listings auto-fit depending on the screen size since there are so many devices. I'll try experimenting with bigger sizes for the listings.

title: Suggestions
comment: 1. In drawer, image at top appears low res. 2. In read mode, action bar is so transparent that text can't be read properly. Since it can be hidden by tapping middle of screen, maybe do away with the transparency. 3. Some manga fail to load thumbnails. 4. Maybe list length could be shortened? The arrows at the bottom and limited page length are nice but perhaps it could be shortened a little more to save memory/improve performance. 5. Upon launching, status bar loads glitchy because splash image hides it.

1. I can't control the quality provided by sources. 2. I'll make it opaque. 3. Thumbnails are from local database, new manga from latest updates do not set thumbnails. 4. I'll update the catalogue to paginate less than the current 1000 which page number indicator. 5. I'll try to alter the transition animation. :)

title: AWESOME
comment: YEHAY!! I FOUND THE PERFECT MANGA READING APP. When i was about to lose hoe on finding a good manga app,i found this! Keep up the good work...  (BTW the download page works now,it showed up after i re-download it) tnx a lot!!

Thanks! It has a Download Manga page to access all your downloaded series. When adding to queue, it only shows available chapters which you didn't download yet. If this isn't what you are discussing about please edit the comment or send an email.

title: Amazing!
comment: But it really needs more control on zoom because some manhwa weren't cut down making it really hard to read anything from those tiny text. Suggestion : would love to have mangafox for source and a vertical reading mode and just maybe a cloud restore function.

Thanks! I don't think I can improve image quality anymore as it is dependent on sources. I suggest choosing different sources to test which one works best. I can't access MangaFox, but NOEZ owns both MangaFox and MangaHere. The vertical reading has been suggested. A cloud restore is unfeasible for me as a student whose app is completely free.

title: Nice app
comment: I love it but the colors are too bright, try to pick some darker pallette

title: Nice reader, needs a few improvements
comment: So, this is (for me) quite the best reader, but there are a few things I want to point out, even when minor: First of with a bug. Whenever I open a manga, the first page will show an exclamation mark until I reload, then the image displays. Now Suggestions: A dark theme, statusbar color updating when viewing manga info, stop download manager when the queue is empty and finally I hate the arrows in the catalogue view, let me opt in that and a few things more.

The bug may be dependent on your connection. I'll investigate it. For the first two suggestions, they'll be far on the list. The downloader should auto-shutdown; I'll investigate it. The arrows hide on scrolling; they are used to page the catalogue for performance reasons while still allowing maneuverability unlike demand-loading.

title: I liked this app
comment: Only if you could add Mangafox to the sources, I'll consider downloading it again.
Thanks! I can't access MangaFox where I live properly to ensure it would work, yet I believe MangaHere, an available source, is owned by the same company NOEZ which also owns MangaTown.

title: Just one suggestion
comment: This app has been amazing for me!! Thank you so much for making this. My only suggestion is to have a scrolling function (scroll up and down reading manga). Thank you!!!
Thanks! It's a good feature request. :) It's been requested before, yet I just didn't have the time to implement it. A vertical reader requires quite a bit of customization to make.
When ever I downloaded something I wasn't able to read it will not approve or use till fixed!

Sorry! After you added chapter to queue, did you start the downloader? Can you provide specific information? My developer console doesn't show what version you installed. Did you originally install it from Google Play? Downloads from other websites uploaded outdated versions without my permission.
Great app!

title: Suggestion on Manga Updates
comment: Totally loved your app creation more than the others. I would like to suggest auto manga updates notification so I can catch up with the new chaps for my fav mangas. Peace out. :D

Thanks! Visit https://github.com/jparkie/Aizoban/issues/8 for information about update notifications. Because this apps is a hobby of mine which is free without advertisements as it is open-sourced, I have no feasible way for implementing this feature. :( If you really want it, some other paid or premium apps do have it.

It's all good and all to have all these updates but the biggest problem of this app has yet to be solved, every once in a while the app crashes and the pages just wont load no matter what you do, each tie this happens i have to close the app turn off and on the wifi service and then reopen the app to continue reading, and i really really hope you fix that

Is this for the current update? I haven't received any new automatic crash reports. Before, I updated the image loader component, and it was causing random crashes. I downgraded it until its developers solved the issue.

title: Amazing job Jacob
comment: The app is amazing. The best manga reader I've tried. Nice design, nice download speeds. I have two requests. First, the manga sources are limited, they may be same,but I just prefer some of them. Secondly when I download manga, I would like to have the option to start downloading immediately, instead of just queuing. Once again thanks  this great app. @everyone, you need to try it out for yourself.

For a new update hopefully before Saturday, Batoto (EN) will be added. If Batoto works well, I'll add all of the other languages. You can see what new changes it has here: https://github.com/jparkie/Aizoban/milestones.

title: Really awesome but
comment: I love the app but can't seem to download any chapters since its stuck at fetching link
대박~

title: One of the greatest manga apps available!
comment: Would highly recommend to anyone. There's yet to be a manga series I haven't found on here. I use this along with Manga Meow (for rare occasions when Aizoban's scan is too grainy). In case you wondered: Yes, my manga is available on here.

Thanks! In an upcoming update, the image sharpness is going to improve; visit https://github.com/jparkie/Aizoban/issues/23 for comparisons. It will also have Batoto (EN): https://github.com/jparkie/Aizoban/issues/24. Finally! Although since its a new source, I won't add other languages until I get my Batoto (EN) logic faster. :)

title: Great!
comment: Perfect little manga app that i wish i found sooner! I do wish that the interface of the "favorite manga" page looked more like that of the "catalogue" , since i love the simplistic colorful tiled look with all the manga covers being displayed, but that might just be personal preference. Great job on this anywho and i look forward to future updates!

title: Nice
comment: Pretty UI, and good selection. Just needs some polishing. For example, if right to left is enabled along with fit to height the viewer should start panned to the right instead of the left (it's manga this is expected behavior). Edit: Thanks for the reply, an email is forthcoming.

Thanks! :) It's just MangaEden sources which don't have genre selection. As a hobby, it's difficult having a script burn through a lot of time and bandwidth for complex sources while keeping it free without ads. You could email me if this is an important issue.

title: Love the selection but..
comment: They really need to add a filter for genre's

Thanks! :) It's just MangaEden sources which don't have genre selection. As a hobby, it's difficult having a script burn through a lot of time and bandwidth for complex sources while keeping it free without ads. You could email me if this is an important issue.

title: This is amazing
comment: Its a great app but could you please fix the loading problem. Love this app
Hello! What loading problem? If you can provide me specifics like the Source used, the device, used, the Android version used, and more information for me to replicate the problem, then I can fix it.

title: Love it but..
comment: It says that it's completed but it's still unfinished???!!

title: Great app but.....
comment: Sometimes it crashes or takes while to load

Hello! Does it crash with the new update? If you can provide me specifics like the Source used, the device, used, the Android version used, and more information for me to replicate the problem, then I can fix it.

title: Really awesome
comment: Tried a lot of manga apps and just downloaded this and it's definitely one of the most aesthetically pleasing manga apps out there, nice colours and layout, I really like it a lot.

title: Please fix
comment: I love the layout, but unfortunately the scans are super pixelated for me, even when I zoom in. This has been a problem for me on all manga reading apps I've used so far. Please optimize this app for smaller devices. I'm using a Samsung Galaxy Star 5282.

Hello! Sorry! Like other apps, I have no control over the sources which house the scans. This app is a hobby of mine, so it is completely free and open-sourced, so I do not have the resources like some companies to use certain technologies or even form contracts with publishers which would allow for higher quality scans.

title: Nice, but!!!
comment: The words aren't clear to my Samsung Galaxy Star phone. Even if I zoom it. Pls don't ignore this!!! Fix it pls!!! I badly want to read my favorite manga again!
https://github.com/jparkie/Aizoban/issues/23. Hopefully, by the end of the week, this enhancement will go live which improves image quality slightly but puts more strain on the phone's memory.

title: Great!
comment: Love the app!
Best manga reader I have ever seen! Thank so much for making this app!
Really awesome

title: Fantastic
comment: This app ran great. My only issue with it was the size of it.

title: More Source
comment: It would be better if there is more source Like "Batoto" 4 stars for now
Thanks. Disable "Enable Lazy Loading" in settings, to load all the pages in the background.

title: Not bad
comment: The download speeds are great, but PLEASSSSSE PLEASE PLEASE REMOVE THE BLUE BORDERS AROUND THE PAGE WHILST READING MANGA. Having the small blue buttons and manga title at the top is extremely annoying, and gets in the way of the page. It feels suffocating. Please at least give the option to get rid of those "things." The manga itself should be the only thing visible. It honestly makes the app almost unusable for me. There was an app named manga +. It had nothing in the way of the pages. Please respond!

If you click the Toolbar Menu and then click "Help", it explains how to hide them. If you single tap the middle of the screen, it hides all the Toolbar and FABs, and if you have Android 4.4 or above, it enables Immersive Mode also. Edit: http://youtu.be/arVepCVd7eo.

title: Best manga reader there is
comment: This is definitely  the best Manga reader on the Google play store. It let's you read and download the Manga. Get it. Get it now.

This app is good but i've encountered some problems #1. I can't delete downloaded manga chapters to save some space fr new manga #2. When i'm trying to zoom chapters it's very vague that i can't read it and it hurts my eyes and head.. please fix it.. thank u

title: Omg!
comment: -faints-

title: Woow
comment: Congratulations, this app is really good. I don't read manga but with this I'm thinking in starting!!! Just a little remark, it would be really good if you could add a French source. Otherwise just wow! (Y)

title: Damn awesome...maybe the best
comment: This app is seriously awesome...thanks a lot man...this app is seriously worth all the search...but I still don't know what "enable lazy loading" does

Thanks. "Lazy Loading" prevents the application from downloading all the images in the background. This is to save bandwidth, but it makes reading slower as images are downloaded on demand (turning the page).

title: Awesome!
comment: Best manga app i've seen so far. All free and easy to use. You deserve more 5 stars. Thank you for this amazing app. Hands down.

title: Love it!!!🙌
comment: I can download my fav manga!!!

title: Love it
comment: Best one I've come across so far

Thank you for this great app! I've tried a lot of apps and this was one of the best. Although I think it would be nice if you can also delete downloaded manga by series instead of by chapter. I also think users would appreciate it if you didn't have to keep returning to the catalogue menu. And like others mentioned more sources like mangafox would be great. Even so, I still think this app is amazing and I also love the interface.

title: Perfection
comment: This app is awesome. It has a very wide selection of manga, the text is easily read, and the queue function works great.

title: Great App.
comment: Better than all the alternatives.

title: overall it's good, but is missing some things that would make it great
comment: this looks to be the best reader in years but 1. I haven't seen any indication or anything from the description or in the settings that the app is capable of notification,  either to the device or simply in the app itself, of a new chapter for a favorite manga (which is my biggest issue, with the rest being selfish things I'd like) 2. no way to back up favorites list 3. mangafox (en) isn't an available source (completely selfish) 4. no way to search across multiple sources (still being selfish)

Thanks! Three points are logged here already: https://github.com/jparkie/Aizoban/issues for more info. Notifications have methods ready, but concern of device's bandwidth and processing issues exist. I don't want all the financial or legal responsibilities to implement practical solutions like a company would as an independent student developer.

title: Very well designed.
comment: Simple, functional, gets Material Design very right. Works especially well on small tablets like the Nexus 7. One small niggle: when right-to-left page turning order is selected, the orientation of the on-screen buttons does not change (the right button *advances* a chapter, while a swipe from right to left or a tap on the right side of the screen instead sends the user *back* a chapter or page). Fix that or provide an option to toggle and this app would be perfect.

title: Great but
comment: The app is more stable now but the downloading is still slow fetching links.
Definitely! I can add an option in settings to control where the app opens. Yeah sometimes the download slows down. I'll have to check it out.

Sorry! Can you tell me where in the app: browsing manga or reading chapters? The more details I get, I can narrow where I can profile the app for bottlenecks. If it's slow for a certain source, I have no control over their servers and the connection you may receive. I'll try emulating your device and test the app if I have time.

I was just being a dummy and have since worked it out.

Like right now, the most recent is at the bottom but a toggle that allows the very first chapter to be at the top of the page would be cool. 👍👍👍👍
Thanks! :D Definitely, I can either add a toggle or just reorder them from first to last instead. I'll add it to the list.

title: I love it <3  good work (Y)
comment: The only problem I have is that when I click to save on my sd card, it says unable to mount to external device when actually my sd is mounted. I saw a similar comment from Ken but I can't understand how to create a folder to make the manga go there and it says sdcard1,will it really be able to store the manga on my sd card,it will really help. And I wanted to ask:  is there a limit of download? Other applications would limit their downloaded manga to 2 or 3. This is the perfect app if it can save on my sd

There is no download limit. The app is completely free and open-sourced, so their will be no limit on features. I noticed the external storage worked for Samsung devices but not Sony devices. I'll check it out. What Android versions are you using?

comment: 1. Notifications for new chapters can be added 2. Adding an option for jumping to a specific page in a chapter would be nice.  3. Would be cool if it shows the last page of the previous chapter on pressing previous chapter button.  4. The next chapter button does not work if the subsequent chapters are not present.                                           5. Option to download manga immediately instead of adding to queue and option to change position of chapters in the queue.

1. Request is logged on GitHub. 2. I can't believe I forgot this. :D 3. I don't think I can since online chapters fetches pages, I won't know the last page before it loads. 4. I did not know that. I'll log this issue. :) 5. It used to download immediately until some people told me not to.

title: Great potential
comment: External storage not working say fails to mount

Is your external storage an SD card? If you put an SD card in your phone, make sure it's mounted so that a file can be written. For example, if you choose ".../sdcard1/" that folder needs to exist. Otherwise, I'll make a folder if your Xperia Z3 doesn't when it mounts an external storage.

title: Great Update
comment: So far all of my problems from the last update are gone. I was a bit confused at first since a lot changed but now, I'm used to it. Please don't push yourself too hard, I know you're sick. I hope you're feeling well :D
Thanks! I actually got the green light from my doctor to be able to go to school since I don't get fevers anymore and can walk again.

Unfortunately it's missing the only setting that matters, the ability to stretch images to the width of your device or height depending on the orientation of your device. Edit: I realized today that I was being a little unfair by only giving this app two stars because as of right now this app has the cleanest interface I've seen so far cosmetically and has the best image scroll performance on a low powered device (1st gen kindle). I'll be updating the stars when the feature Ireferencedisimplemented. Thanks.
Uploaded a new update with the ability to choose view types: "Fit Centre", "Fit Width", and "Fit Height".
Love the offline reading and it has fast engine when download it.

Sorry. I have no control of the data of the sources. The completion status is just read from the websites.

No you are not doing something wrong. Sorry! :( I'm trying to fix the issue. External Storage is very weird with Android on different versions and different devices; it's hard to test. Can you email me what Android version you are on, if you are rooted, and the titles you downloaded?

comment: This is what I'm talking about you have all the manga there is!!!  Loading is a little slow but everything is definitely up to my expectations I'm so happy that someone knows what to do keep up the great work

Thanks! :) If you want faster image loading, you disable "Enable Lazy Loading" in settings. I had it enabled by default to save data usage, but if people don't like it; I'll switch the default to load all the images as more people message me about it.

Best app ever!first time i see there's only 1 thousand people download it,i don't think this app is good but after i check it out,this app is amazing,it has every manga you want with a lot of volume update amazingg

title: Just...wow.

Or maybe, it's just the source and not the app itself. Idk. Will be downloading all my fave manga (again) then I'll delete my old manga reader. Awesome work, man!
Thanks! :) I recommend holding off on downloading too much. I fixed some weird bugs with external storage, wake lock, and other stuff. I just need to upload the update.

title: Very nice.
comment: This is such a great app. One feature I'd like to have, that everyone mentioned, are the automatic checking for new chapters in our favorites list every few hours and second a push notification about it. And the other feature I'd love is to be able to save backups of our favorites at any time, and being able to restore them later on. Other than these, this is a very, very great app. Love the material design looks!

Thanks! Feature requests might take some time to implement. However, I logged these two feature requests here: https://github.com/jparkie/Aizoban/issues/8 and https://github.com/jparkie/Aizoban/issues/9. When I have time available, I'll try to implement them. The notifications for updates has been thought out; I just need to address some concerns.

Thanks! I added the issue. I have slight improvements for downloads ready. If those don't work, I'll research into changing the image viewer logic. :) When I release an update, can you either email me or update this review whether the loading problem still exists? I'll also update this reply with what changes I did.

I'm having doubts with implementing notifications. I can't do what other apps do because I can't finance a backend. I have it designed, but I worry about its data usage. In the background, it'd check the web page for each favourite manga. It'd might be a problem if there are a lot of favourites. If people message it's okay, I'll implement it.

title: WHAT HAVE YOU DONE!

Which Source and Manga? Try disabling Lazy Loading in Settings. The download manager is different from previous versions. It queues downloads, then you have to go to the queue to start the download. By default the download manager downloads on WiFi, if you are not using WiFi, disable it. Otherwise, please email me more specifics.

title: Seriously good
comment: I just downloaded this reader and already love it. It has a gorgeous design, and has pretty much everything I am interested in reading right now. Plus, changeable sources are always good. When you tap the middle of the screen, does it hide the top bar? I don't know whether if it isn't compatible with all devices. In the viewer, if you click "Help", it explains more. If it doesn't work, can you edit this message or email me? I used a lower version alternative to immersive mode.

title: Uh..

I'll also try to add more sources, so if others are down, you can still read. I think MangaHere was down a bit on December 1st for maintenance.

title: Great App
comment: Wow, this is a wonderful manga app; the best I've seen so far. The only issues I've come across is some lag in the Catalogue and New Manga screens. On lollipop, the status bar color doesn't change to match the header in the overview/chapter list for mangas. Besides that, awesome work!

Currently, you just long click the chapter to download it, but I don't recommend downloading anything for now as the new update will wipe all old data including downloads. When the update comes out, it will be more user-friendly and offline-friendly.

title: Genre
comment: Its a great manga.  But y the genre doesn't have any yuri or yaoi in it?  .can u add this two in the genre list . Other than that its awesome

title: The best manga app in market without ads!!!
comment: I really like this app style, the interface is really nice and looks kinda material (with a little update can be full material :D) nice manga sources (although it needs more, but it has my favorite ones except batoto) but they're only in english (for other languages readers...) and is full free without ads! really awesome!! (which is really annoying in other apps). Thnaks for the reply! i can't wait to see it with Material Design! One question... is there a possibility you can add an option to sync favorites to an online source?

Thanks! Since last week, I started redeveloping this application with Material Design from scratch with a better architecture which supports easy upgrades. I got all the previous online features working. I hope to finish the offline features by end of this week, so I can test it next week. Hopefully, I'll try to add Batoto. :)

title: I love this app
comment: And i love you man! BEST APP EVERRR!! :D

title: Beautiful. One bug though.
comment: Loving this! However I have a problem, when loading a chapter, the first image always gives me an exclamation point error. Refreshing the chapter usually fixes it.
Thanks! I am currently redeveloping the application from scratch. Hopefully, the new architecture for the image loading will prevent this. I'll try to release it some time in December. :)

title: Solid design, no batoto.
comment: Pretty much useless for me without it. Looks good though.

title: not downloading
comment: love this but recently none of my manga are downloading and my internets working just fine o.O

title: Great!
comment: Best manga reader out there!! However, the bars on top and bottom while one is reading the manga tend to get in the way. Could you maybe look into making them smaller or something? I have to zoom in to see the tops and bottoms of certain pages.

So far I love the app visually  the only real problem I having with the app is that it doesn't seem load  any pages for my downloaded  offline manga yet it will load    them when  I'm online reading it is a real problem for me since. I   rarely read it online

title: Problem with the new update
comment: Can't seem to download single Manga :(
Sorry! The download manger is in beta. D: I am now working on a new update to the download logic which should reduce the number of failures and memory errors. Hope to have it out soon!

title: Excellent
comment: Tried so many manga apps and this is the best by far on the market. I won't mind a couple bucks if you decide to do so. Download it. You won't need another one.

title: Amazing work
comment: I am very impressed by this app. Really beautiful ui and a joy to use. I hope to see continued work on this app. I would not hesitate to pay for this app. If this app will ever had ads in the future, please give us an option to remove the ads with a pro version.

title: Nice but needs work
comment: This has alot of potential, needs more sources and download chapter selection. Looking forward to future updates
Thanks! I made a list of potential new sources. I am just halting in adding them until I refine the application more. You can now long press a chapter to activate the download menu. :D

title: All the best
comment: Other readers does not complement the source well, but this one works. Although having used other reader before, it has been removed, and this one is the best successor to it
Super seksy app +rep

title: The best ever
comment: I've downloaded many but this one is by far the greatest, I'm not to picky but I really like everything about it. Keep up the good work

title: Just try it.
comment: Awesome app! Its interactive, dynamic, efficient interface provides an experience unlike other manga apps.
